languages.text: "Разве не провидцы приняли неверное решение? Что бы изменилось, окажись ты на Крударахе?"

traits.locale_text: "Разве не провидцы приняли неверное решение? Что бы изменилось, окажись ты на Крударахе?"

languages.text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"
languages.original_text: "Разве не провидцы приняли неверное решение? Что бы изменилось, окажись ты на Крударахе?"

traits.locale_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you'd been on Crudarach?"
"Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you'd been on Crudarach?"
"Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"
"Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"
"Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

languages.text: «¿No fueron los videntes quienes tomaron la decisión equivocada? ¿Qué diferencia habría supuesto tu presencia en Crudarach?».
languages.original_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No fueron los videntes quienes tomaron la decisión equivocada? ¿Qué diferencia habría supuesto tu presencia en Crudarach?».

languages.text: 「判断を誤ったのは先見司だったんじゃないのか？お前がクルダラにいたところで、どんな違いが生まれていたというんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: 「判断を誤ったのは先見司だったんじゃないのか？お前がクルダラにいたところで、どんな違いが生まれていたというんだ？」

languages.text: “这一切之所以会发生，难道不是因为那些先知做了个错误的决定吗？就算你当时真的在克鲁达拉赫，这一切又能有什么不同呢？”
languages.original_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: “这一切之所以会发生，难道不是因为那些先知做了个错误的决定吗？就算你当时真的在克鲁达拉赫，这一切又能有什么不同呢？”

languages.text: « Les Grands Prophètes n'ont-ils pas eux-mêmes pris la mauvaise décision ? En quoi votre présence sur Crudarach aurait-elle fait une différence ? »
languages.original_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: « Les Grands Prophètes n'ont-ils pas eux-mêmes pris la mauvaise décision ? En quoi votre présence sur Crudarach aurait-elle fait une différence ? »

languages.text: "Es waren doch die Runenpropheten, die die falsche Entscheidung trafen? Was hätte es denn für einen Unterschied gemacht, wenn Ihr auf Crudarach gewesen wärt?"
languages.original_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: "Es waren doch die Runenpropheten, die die falsche Entscheidung trafen? Was hätte es denn für einen Unterschied gemacht, wenn Ihr auf Crudarach gewesen wärt?"

languages.text: "Yanlış karara varan, Ötesezenler değil mi? Crudarach'ta olman ne gibi bir fark yaratabilirdi?"
languages.original_text: "Was it not the Farseers who made a bad decision? What difference would it have made if you had been on Crudarach?"

traits.locale_text: "Yanlış bir karara varanlar, Ötesezenler değil miydi? Crudarach'ta olman ne gibi bir fark yaratabilirdi?"
